pilgrimage.name: Kirateshwar Mahadev Temple
pilgrimage.location: Legship, on the banks of the River Rangeet (West Sikkim)
pilgrimage.description: Dedicated to Lord Shiva, located along the Rangit River, famous during Bala Chaturdashi festival.

village.name: Yuksom
village.location: Gyalshing district of Sikkim, about 40 km north of Gyalshing (West Sikkim)
village.description: First capital of Sikkim and gateway to Goechala trek, rich in cultural landmarks.

adventure.name: Goecha La
adventure.location: Gyalshing district of Sikkim, in the eastern Himalayas
adventure.description: Mountain pass offering views of Kanchenjunga, trekking and mountaineering.

heritage.name: Rabdentse Ruins
heritage.description: Vestiges of second capital of Sikkim, scenic views, cultural legacy.

buddhist_circuit.name: Pemayangtse Monastery
buddhist_circuit.description: Historic site with sacred atmosphere and wooden “Zangdok Palri”.

mice.name: Solophok Chardham Complex
mice.location: Solophok Hill, 5 km from Namchi (South Sikkim)
mice.description: Replicas of four sacred Dhams with large Lord Shiva statue, religious and tourist site.

monasteries.name: Rumtek Monastery
monasteries.description: Main seat of Karma Kagyu lineage, sacred relics and Buddhist art.

monasteries.name: Phodong Monastery
monasteries.founded: Early 18th century by Chogyal Gyurmed Namgyal
monasteries.description: Center of Karma Kagyu sect, scenic murals, local festivals.

monasteries.name: Tashiding Monastery
monasteries.founded: 1641 by Ngadak Sempa Chempo Phunshok Rigzing
monasteries.description: Sacred monastery between Rathong and Rangeet rivers, serene atmosphere.

monasteries.name: Ralang Monastery
monasteries.description: Cultural heritage and active monastic community.

monasteries.name: Enchey Monastery
monasteries.description: Tranquil Buddhist site with vibrant murals and architecture.

monasteries.name: Dubdi Monastery
monasteries.description: Grandmother of Sikkimese monasteries, historical and spiritual site.
